title: Kotsutsubo (2012)
overview: Eri (Matsubara) is a high school student who is anonymous unlike her friend Mitsuko (Yokoyama) who is the target of amorous advances from their teacher, Ichida (Tsubouchi). Eri comes across a novel way to protect Mitsuko: find a cursed funerary urn that contains ashes reputed to cause death and give said ashes to teacher.
storyline: Eri is an inconspicuous female high school student who goes completely unnoticed by her classmates. In contrast, her childhood friend Mitsuko is the class leader and is constantly hit on by their creepy teacher, Chida. In order to protect her friend, Eri obtains a funerary rumored to hold ashes that cause certain death for anyone who gets them in their mouth.
